thread.section_title: Paddy Power Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Paddy Power | www.paddypower.com
thread.title: Andy Chapman
thread.title_full: Paddy Power reviewed by Andy Chapman

author: Andy Chapman
title: Andy Chapman
text: 2.05 Haydock. Gave my name Acc number etc. at 2.01 .for the first time ever i had to confirm my address, put on hold , put on hold again,too late to put a bet on cause I wanted to watch the race, the rest is history Zarkander 9/4. After hearing Leicester were fielding a weekend team against Porto I asked for a price that Porto win by 3 or more goals.After being put on hold I was told "no, there are no odds on that"
